commits.body: Fix resize observer dependency to respond to reader mode changes
commits.title: Merge pull request #69 from devmade-ai/claude/fix-read-view-image-3c2S3

commits.subject: Fix reader mode canvas not using available space
commits.body:
The ResizeObserver tracking container width was set up with an empty
dependency array, so it only observed the editor mode's DOM element.
When switching to reader mode, the ref pointed to a new DOM element
but the observer was still watching the old (removed) one, causing
containerWidth to go stale. This made the canvas render much smaller
than the available viewport.

Adding isReaderMode to the dependency array ensures the observer
re-attaches to the correct DOM element on mode switch.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01Mf3ye3eTc6NcnAQYzK82xE
commits.title: Fix reader mode canvas not using available space

commits.subject: Add semantic color tokens for light/dark mode
commits.body:
Created CSS variables and Tailwind tokens for consistent theming:

CSS Variables (in index.css):
- --color-text-default/muted/subtle/faint for text
- --color-surface/elevated/inset/hover for backgrounds
- --color-border/subtle/strong for borders

Tailwind Config (ui namespace):
- text-ui-text, text-ui-text-muted, etc.
- bg-ui-surface, bg-ui-surface-elevated, etc.
- border-ui-border, border-ui-border-subtle, etc.

Refactored components to use semantic classes instead of
paired light/dark classes (e.g., text-ui-text-muted instead
of text-zinc-600 dark:text-zinc-300).

This makes color maintenance easier and ensures consistency.

- Overlay (type, color, opacity)
- Fonts (title/body)
- Text alignment (horizontal/vertical)
- Image filters (grayscale, sepia, blur, contrast, brightness)

Looks no longer change theme or layout structure - those are now
independent preset categories in the Presets tab.

12 looks organized into 4 categories:
- Clean: Clean, Minimal, Soft
- Bold: Bold, Dramatic, Punch
- Vintage: Vintage, Retro, Film
- Noir: Noir, Mono, Duotone

commits.subject: Revert per-group alignment to cell-level alignment
commits.body:
Per-group alignment caused text elements to overlap because each group
was rendered in its own absolutely positioned container. This change
reverts to cell-level alignment where all text groups in a cell share
a single alignment container, allowing text to flow naturally.

- Simplified textGroups state to only store cell assignment (no alignment)
- Removed per-group alignment controls from Placement tab
- Updated AdCanvas to render all groups in single container per cell

commits.subject: Implement nested grid layout system with resizable cells
commits.body:
Replace the old row/column split system with a new nested grid approach:
- Primary split (rows or columns) with optional subdivisions per section
- Each section has customizable size percentages
- Image goes in a single cell (no spanning complexity)
- Visual cell picker in UI shows layout structure clearly

New features:
- Add/remove sections dynamically
- Toggle subdivisions per section (split button)
- Resize sections and subdivisions with sliders
- New "Grid" category with 4 preset layouts using nested cells
- Click-to-select image cell in visual preview

Breaking change: Layout state structure changed from splitType/sections/imageCells
to type/structure/imageCell format.
commits.title: Implement nested grid layout system with resizable cells

was capturing the scaled-down version. Now temporarily sets scale(1) during
capture to export at correct dimensions.
